title: Technic Elepower Compatibility
name: technic_elepower_compat
short_description: Elepower recipes for Technic machines. Technic recipes for Elepower machines. A new converter connects Technic cables to Elepower conduits when enabled.
long_description: A collaboration project with Bob64, also known as DustyBagel, to help Technic and Elepower work together. Recipes were added for Technic machines to make some items from Elepower, and for Elepower machines to make some items from Technic. A new converter developed by Bob64 connects Technic cables to Elepower conduits when enabled. This is an expanded replacement of Grinder Compatibility.
